name: settle-sdk-node
description: An easy to use SDK for Node.js with all the best practices to kickstart your integration with the Settle Payment Platform.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version prerelease && npm publish
scripts.publish:prepatch: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version prepatch && npm publish
scripts.publish:preminor: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version preminor && npm publish
scripts.publish:premajor: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version premajor && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run clean && npm run build && git commit -am 'Bumping npm version' && git push && npm version major && npm publish

author: Christian Wick <christian@settle.eu>
